simpledoorkey.description: an agent in a minigrid environment in reinfrocement learning, the task of the agent is open the door in the maze with key. please help agent to plan the next action given agent's current observations and statu: carry {object} or none. Availabel actions may includes: explore, go to {object}, pick up {an object}, toggle {an object}. the actions should be displayed in a list {}. Do not explain the reasoning.
simpledoorkey.example: Examples: observation: {observed a door}, action: {explore}. observation: {observed a key, observed a door}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key, go to the door, toggle the door}. observation: {observed a door, carry key}, action: {go to the door, toggle the door}. observation: {observed nothing}, action: {explore}. observation: {observed a key}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key, explore}.

keyinbox.description: an agent in a minigrid environment in reinfrocement learning, the task of the agent is to toggle the door in the maze. key is hidden is a box. Please help agent to plan the next actions given observation and statu: carry {object} or none. Availabel actions may includes: explore, go to {object}, pick up {an object}, toggle {an object}. the actions should be displayed in a list. Do not explain the reasoning.
keyinbox.example: Example: observation: {observed nothing}, action: {explore}. observation: {observed a box, observed a door}, action: {go to the box, toggle the box, pick up key, go to door, toggle door}. observation: {observed a box}, action: {go to the box, toggle the box, pick up key, explore}. observation: {observed a key}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key, explore}. observation: {observed a key, observed a door}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key, go to door, toggle the door}. observation: {observed a door}, action: {explore}. observation: {observed a door, carry key}, action: {go to the door, toggle the door}.

randomboxkey.description: an agent in a minigrid environment in reinfrocement learning, the task of the agent is to toggle the door in the maze. key may be hidden in a box. Please help agent to plan the next actions given observation and statu: carry {object} or none. Availabel actions may includes: explore, go to {object}, pick up {an object}, toggle {an object}. the actions should be displayed in a list {}. Do not explain the reasoning.
randomboxkey.example: Example: observation: {observed a box, carry key}, action: {explore}. observation: {observed a box, observed a door, carry key}, action: {go to the door, toggle the door}. observation: {obseved a key, observed a box, observed a door}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key, go to the door, toggle the door}. observation: {observed nothing}, action: {explore}. observation: {observed a door}, action: {explore}. observation: {observed a box}, action: {go to the box, toggle the box}. observation: {observed a key}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key}. observation: {observed a door, carry key}, action: {go to the door, toggle the door}. observation: {observed a key, observed a door}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key, go to the door, toggle the door}. observation: {observed a box, observed a door}, action: {go to the box, toggle the box}. observation: {observed a key, observed a box}, action: {go to the key, pick up the key, explore}.

coloreddoorkey.description: an agent in a minigrid environment in reinfrocement learning, the task of the agent is to toggle the door in the maze. key is hidden is a box. Please help agent to plan the next actions given observation and statu: carry {object} or none. Availabel actions may includes: explore, go to {object}, pick up {an object}, toggle {an object}. the actions should be displayed in a list. Do not explain the reasoning.
coloreddoorkey.example: Example:observation: {observed a red key, observed a red door, carry yellow key}, infer: observe a red key, observed a red door, carry a yellow key,  so red door and red observed key have the same color red, so agent should obtain the red observed key. action: {go to red key, pick up red key}. Example:observation: {observed a purple key, observed a grey door, carry grey key}, infer: observed a purple key, observed a grey door, carry a grey key, so grey door and grey carry key have the same color grey, so the agent should directly go to grey door and toggle grey door. action: {go to grey door, toggle grey door}. Example:observation: {observed a blue key, observed a green key, observed a blue door}, infer: observed a blue key and a green key, observed a blue door, no carry key, so blue door and one of observed key have the same color blue. so agent should obtain the blue observed key. action: {go to blue key, pick up blue key}. Example:observation: {observed a purple door, carry grey key}, infer: no observed key, observed a purple door, carry a grey key, so purple door and grey carry key have the different color, so agent can not toggle purple door. action: {explore}. Example:observation: {observed a yellow door, carry yellow key}, infer: no observed key, observed a yellow door, carry a yellow key, so yellow door and yellow carry key have the same color yellow, so the agent should directly go to yellow door and toggle yellow door. action: {go to yellow door, toggle yellow door}. Example:observation: {observed a green key, observed a grey door}, infer: observed a green key, observed a grey door, no carry key, so grey door and green observed key have different color, so agent can not toggle grey door. action: {explore}. Example:observation: {observed a red key, observed a yellow key}, infer: observed a yellow key and a red key, no observed door, no carry key, so agent should obtain the red observed key. action: {go to red key, pick up red key}. Example:observation: {observed a purple key, observed a purple door}, infer: observed a purple key, observed a purple door, no carry key, so purple door and purple observed key have the same color purple, so the agent should obtain the purple observed key. action: {go to purple key, pick up purple key}. Example:observation: {observed a blue door}, infer: no observed key, observed a blue door, no carry key. action: {explore}. Example:observation: {observed a yellow key}, infer: observed a yellow key, no observed door, no carry key, agent should obtain the yellow observed key. action: {go to yellow key, pick up yellow key}. Example:observation: {observed nothing}, infer: nothing is observed. action: {explore}. 'infer:' provide inference detail for plan actions.
